summary: The diff shows modifications to 27 frontend files (with 7 omitted due to limits). The build request requires a full revert of both frontend and backend to Version 6, removing all changes from Versions 7–13. The diff only shows frontend component changes and no backend file changes at all. Without access to Version 6 snapshots, it is impossible to verify whether the frontend files exactly match Version 6. The diff also omits 7 modified files and shows no backend changes, making it impossible to confirm complete compliance with REQ-1.

missing_requirements.requirement: All backend files match the Version 6 snapshot exactly.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend files appear in the diff at all. If backend changes were introduced in Versions 7–13, they have not been reverted here.

missing_requirements.requirement: All frontend files match the Version 6 snapshot exactly, including files omitted from the diff.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff notes 7 modified files were omitted due to limits, so it cannot be confirmed that all frontend files have been reverted to Version 6 state.
